definition: inspired by a feeling of fearful wonderment or reverence
details:
adjective
- inspired by a feeling of fearful wonderment or reverence
= example: inspired by a feeling of fearful wonderment or reverence
= synonyms: awful
- having or showing a feeling of mixed reverence and respect and wonder and dread
= example: having or showing a feeling of mixed reverence and respect and wonder and dread
= synonyms: awestruck, awestricken
